meanings.definition: The flat, movable bone at the front of the knee joint.
meanings.sent1: She felt a sharp pain in her patellae when she tried to stand up.
meanings.sent2: The doctor examined her patellae to check for any injuries.
meanings.sent3: The patellae decided to take a break from all the bending and straightening.
meanings.sent4: Her patellae were like hinges, allowing her to move with ease.
meanings.sent5: The patellae resembled small shields protecting her knee joint.

meanings.sent1: He studied the patellae in the anatomy textbook.
meanings.sent2: The patellae of the skeletons were carefully preserved in the museum.
meanings.sent3: The patellae gathered for a group photo at the bone convention.
meanings.sent4: In his dream, the patellae danced around happily in pairs.
meanings.sent5: The patellae were like puzzle pieces fitting perfectly into the knee joint.
